pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Trusted Boot (tboot) is an open source, pre-kernel/VMM module that uses Intel(R) Trusted Execution Technology (Intel(R) TXT) to perform a measured and verified launch of an OS kernel/VMM.
This version of tboot supports Intel (both retail and Software Development Platforms (SDPs)) and OEM systems that are Intel TXT-capable.
This version of tboot only supports both the Xen virtual machine monitor (versions >= 3.4) and Linux kernel versions >= 2.6.33.
